meanings.definition: To fill with delight or wonder
meanings.sent1: The beautiful sunset enraptures me every evening.
meanings.sent2: The magical story enraptures the children at bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party enraptures everyone with joy and excitement.
meanings.sent4: The enchanting melody enraptures the audience, transporting them to another world.
meanings.sent5: The breathtaking view from the mountaintop enraptures visitors with its beauty.

meanings.definition: To hold the attention of completely
meanings.sent1: The thrilling movie enraptures the audience from start to finish.
meanings.sent2: The captivating speaker enraptures the crowd with her inspiring words.
meanings.sent3: The suspenseful plot enraptures viewers, keeping them on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The mesmerizing dance performance enraptures the spectators, leaving them spellbound.
meanings.sent5: The fascinating documentary enraptures viewers with its intriguing subject matter.
